text:
The body of a missing teenage girl was recovered from the high-security zone area near the Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav’s residence here on Monday.

Left for school on Feb. 10

The class 12 student, who left for school on February 10, had gone missing. Her family filed an FIR at the Jankipuram police station.

The body was recovered on Monday from the Gautampalli area.

The body has been identified by the relatives of the deceased and sent for post-mortem, police said. According to police, the girl may have been sexually assaulted before being killed.

Two detained

Police have detained two persons in connection with the case. — PTI
title: Missing girl’s body found near Akhilesh’s house
